Container.Name: wh-immich-machine-learning
Container.Overview: High performance self-hosted photo and video management solution.
Container.Category: Productivity: Tools: Other: MediaServer:Video MediaServer:Photos Network:Management
Container.Requires: Immich Machine Learning requires: - (Optional) For hardware accelerated machine learning; an CUDA, or OpenVINO capable device. Learn more: https://immich.app/docs/features/ml-hardware-acceleration

Config.Name: Immich machine learning port
Config.Description: The TCP port Immich Machine Learning listens on.

Config.Name: Immich Machine Learning cache
Config.Description: The location where Immich stores its machine learning cache.

Config.Name: OpenVINO devices
Config.Description: Used for OpenVINO accelerated machine learning.

Config.Name: OpenVINO volume
Config.Description: Used for OpenVINO accelerated machine learning.

Config.Name: MACHINE_LEARNING_MODEL_TTL
Config.Description: Inactivity time (in seconds) before a model is unloaded.

Config.Name: MACHINE_LEARNING_MODEL_TTL_POLL_S
Config.Description: Interval (in seconds) between checks for the model.

Config.Name: MACHINE_LEARNING_MODEL_INTRA_OP_THREADS
Config.Description: Number of threads for each model operation.

Config.Name: MACHINE_LEARNING_WORKERS
Config.Description: Number of worker processes to spawn.

Config.Name: MACHINE_LEARNING_WORKER_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: Maximum time (in seconds) of unresponsiveness before a worker is killed. (change to 300 for OpenVINO)
